'Daedalus Flight' is a pre-production mainnet wallet for the Byron reboot.  It's transacting in REAL $ADA so it's only recommended for advanced wallet users who'd like to help test/feedback for the production version.  There is no need for general users to upgrade at this time.

Want to run a #Cardano #Haskell node? Here are step-by-step instructions for Ubuntu 18.04.4:  1. open terminal  2. You will need ghc 8.6.5 and cabal 3.0.0.0 to run Cardano-node. check if you have them  run commands: sudo apt update cabal -V ghc -V  Thread 👇 $ADA  #Cardano
